translation.en: [Peter] Make sure to block him. Make sure he doesn't get over there.
translation.zh: 确保把他挡住 确保他不能到这边来

translation.en: [Peter] I got you. -Nice form. Feel good about that.
translation.zh: -我挡住你了 里奥 -队形不错 感觉很棒！

translation.en: Ah, there you are, Leo, my boy.
translation.zh: 里奥 我的孩子 原来你在这里

translation.en: I told you not to bother me when I'm with my friends.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 我和朋友在一起的时候不要来烦我

translation.en: But I need you to open the books for me.
translation.zh: 可是我需要你帮我打开这本书

translation.en: It takes so much effort to knock even one off the shelf
translation.zh: 我花了很大的力气 把它从书架上拿下来

translation.en: that I haven't the strength to turn pages.
translation.zh: 已经没有力气去翻书了

translation.en: Yes! Point! Point!
translation.zh: 太好了！中了！

translation.en: Okay, remember, we're calling it a goal.
translation.zh: 好吧 记住：我们把这称作“得分”

translation.en: Also, we agreed not to use our hands.
translation.zh: 还有 我们商量好的 不能用手

translation.en: That is the point of leg ball. You use your legs.
translation.zh: 这是脚球的重点 你只能用腿 懂了吗

translation.en: That's dumb. You used your head.
translation.zh: 你这个笨蛋 你还用头了呢

translation.en: Yeah, but that's legal.
translation.zh: 是的 不过那样是可以的

translation.en: Shouldn't it be called leg and head ball?
translation.zh: 那这难道不应该叫脚头球吗？

translation.en: Well, my abuela sewed the ball, so, I get to make the rules.
translation.zh: 这么说吧 这球是我奶奶缝的 所以我来制定规则

translation.en: Ah, youth.
translation.zh: 年轻人

translation.en: In my day, you settled disputes with a duel.
translation.zh: 在我那个年代 是靠决斗解决纷争的

translation.en: I did not have an overabundance of chums by the end.
translation.zh: 所以最后我没什么朋友

translation.en: Could you please get lost?
translation.zh: 请问您能走开吗？

translation.en: Alas, I cannot.
translation.zh: 哦 我不能

translation.en: You're unique, Leo.
translation.zh: 里奥 你是独一无二的

translation.en: The only boy I've ever met with the power to so effortlessly communicate the dead.
translation.zh: 是我见过的唯一一位 能毫不费力地和死人交流的孩子

translation.en: A dark force rises and I must consult my books.
translation.zh: 黑暗势力在崛起 我必须查阅一下我的书

translation.en: Ah, you can turn your own pages, Don Andres. Or just look at the cover.
translation.zh: 唐安德斯 你可以自己翻书 或者只看封面

translation.en: That's what I do.
translation.zh: 我就是这样做的

translation.en: Anyway, I told you, I do not solve ghost problems anymore.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 告诉你 我再也不解决和鬼魂相关的事情了

translation.en: Leo, are you having one of your special times again?
translation.zh: 里奥 又到你的“特殊时期”了？

translation.en: No! And just a minute.
translation.zh: 没有！稍等一下

translation.en: Go away, Don Andres.
translation.zh: 走开 唐安德斯

translation.en: Okay. Let's get back to the inaugural match of head and leg ball.
translation.zh: 好了 回到咱们的首届头脚球比赛

translation.en: How about "football"?
translation.zh: 叫“足球”怎么样？

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.zh: 真漂亮

translation.en: I mean, uh, beautiful idea, heh, Marcella.
translation.zh: 我是说 这主意很棒 玛塞拉

translation.en: Yes... that is a much better name for the game no one will play.
translation.zh: 没错 对于一个没人玩的游戏来说 这真是个好名字

translation.en: You're being stubborn. Expect to be haunted tonight.
translation.zh: 你真是固执 真希望你今晚撞鬼

translation.en: You wanna play with us?
translation.zh: 你想和我们一起玩吗？

translation.en: Um, I don't think she should.
translation.zh: 我觉得不该和她一起玩

translation.en: -Why? -The weird lightning at your place
translation.zh: -为什么？ -因为 自从你和你妈妈搬进来以后

translation.en: since you and your mom moved in. She's a hechicera.
translation.zh: 你家里就有奇怪的闪电 她是个女巫

translation.en: Marcella's mom is not a sorceress.
translation.zh: 玛塞拉的妈妈不是女巫

translation.en: Sorry, Leo. You're weird, but we're used to it.
translation.zh: 对不起 里奥 你真是个怪人 不过我们习惯了

translation.en: Being around an hechicera-in-training? No, thank you.
translation.zh: 想让我们习惯生活在女巫身边吗？ 谢谢你 不过不用了

translation.en: Ah, give them time. You've only been here, what, six months?
translation.zh: 给他们点时间 你来这也才六个月吧？

translation.en: It's fine. The truth is my mother is weird.
translation.zh: 没关系 其实我妈妈是个怪人

translation.en: My whole family is. I'm proud of who I am.
translation.zh: 我们全家都是 我为此感到自豪

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是嘛

translation.en: That's... nice.
translation.zh: 那样…很好

translation.en: Here. For asking me to play. It was sweet of you.
translation.zh: 给你 谢谢你叫我一起玩 你真好

translation.en: Yeah, it was.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I mean, you don't, uh--
translation.zh: 我是想说 你别…

translation.en: Don't mention it. Heh.
translation.zh: 别客气

translation.en: So, shamanism is a pagan belief
translation.zh: 萨满教是一种对精神世界的感知

translation.en: about perceiving and interacting with the spirit world.
translation.zh: 和互动的异教信仰

translation.en: Often, they believe in one special individual with access,
translation.zh: 通常 大家相信一个特别的人

translation.en: whose job it was to speak for the dead.
translation.zh: 这个人有特殊的能力 能为死去的人说话

translation.en: And the dead have much to say.
translation.zh: 死去的人都有太多话想说

translation.en: Why not tell them what dead people are like?
translation.zh: 为什么你不告诉大家 死去的人到底是什么样呢？

translation.en: Friar Tuck might give you extra credit.
translation.zh: 也许修道士塔克能给你额外的线索

translation.en: -What do you want, Teodora? -For you to get your head in the game.
translation.zh: -你想要干什么 特奥多拉？ -想让你一心投入比赛

translation.en: I heard what you said to Don Andres. Not cool.
translation.zh: 我听到你和唐安德斯说的话了 那样可不好

translation.en: I just wanna be my own person.
translation.zh: 我只想做我自己

translation.en: Why is that so much to ask?
translation.zh: 这要求很过分吗？

translation.en: Um, maybe because it's not about you. There are more important things going on.
translation.zh: 也许因为这些事情和你无关 还有更重要的事情呢

translation.en: Don Andres isn't blowing smoke with this rising-evil thing.
translation.zh: 和邪恶势力崛起有关的事 唐安德斯是不会胡说八道的

translation.en: I don't care.
translation.zh: 我根本不在乎

translation.en: Just go away!
translation.zh: 快走开！

translation.en: [Godofredo] Leo, do you mind?
translation.zh: 里奥 你在干什么呢?

translation.en: [Peter] Cuckoo.
translation.zh: 啊哦

translation.en: Um... All right, there's a good explanation for this.
translation.zh: 好吧 对于这件事 我可以解释

translation.en: You're nuts in the head.
translation.zh: 你真是疯了

translation.en: [bell ringing] [kid] Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: Perhaps next week we'll stay awake the whole lesson.
translation.zh: 也许下个星期的课我们能保持清醒

translation.en: I thought you of all people would like this class.
translation.zh: 我还以为你会喜欢这节课呢

translation.en: Sorry, Friar Godofredo.
translation.zh: 对不起 戈多弗雷多修道士

translation.en: I just...
translation.zh: 我只是…

translation.en: Think nothing of it.
translation.zh: 不要放在心上

translation.en: Don Andres?
translation.zh: 唐安德斯？

translation.en: Is that you?
translation.zh: 是你吗？

translation.en: Teo?
translation.zh: 特奥多拉？

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Alebrije. Don't scare me like that.
translation.zh: 啊 爱波瑞吉 别那样吓唬我

translation.en: Oh. Sorry, Leo.
translation.zh: 对不起 里奥

translation.en: Let me guess. You're here to tell me about rising evil.
translation.zh: 让我来猜猜 你来这是为了 告诉我邪恶势力崛起的事

translation.en: No. I just wanted to play checkers with my pal.
translation.zh: 不是 我只是想和我的朋友玩跳棋

translation.en: But now that you mention it, Don Andres and Teo told me what you said.
translation.zh: 不过既然你提到了 唐安德斯和 特奥多拉告诉了我你的答复

translation.en: We're your friends, Leo.
translation.zh: 我们是你的朋友 里奥

translation.en: Says who?
translation.zh: 谁说的？

translation.en: You people all just showed up at my door one day.
translation.zh: 你们这些家伙就突然出现在我家门口

translation.en: Oh, Leo.
translation.zh: 哦 里奥

translation.en: You can't choose to be normal.
translation.zh: 你不能选择成为一个普通人

translation.en: The world always sees us as we are, eventually.
translation.zh: 最终 世界会看出我们的本质的

translation.en: Is that crazy goat bothering you again?
translation.zh: 那只疯狂的山羊又来骚扰你了吗？

translation.en: Ah! I am a beautiful alebrije, woman.
translation.zh: 女士 我是美丽的爱波瑞吉！

translation.en: At least see me as something noble, like a horse, or a dragonfly-- Ow!
translation.zh: 至少应该把我当作高贵的动物 比如说马 或者飞龙…

translation.en: My magical butt!
translation.zh: 哦！我神奇的屁股！

translation.en: Such an odd goat.
translation.zh: 真是个奇怪的山羊

translation.en: Perhaps he has the palsy.
translation.zh: 也许它瘫痪了

translation.en: Come in and I'll fix you some cocoa.
translation.zh: 进来吧 我给你冲杯可可

translation.en: Could you make it a double?
translation.zh: 能给我准备两杯吗？

translation.en: Guy who needs the Heimlich maneuver. No?
translation.zh: 需要海姆利克急救的人 不是？

translation.en: Oh! Two guys that need the Heimlich maneuver.
translation.zh: 两个需要海姆利克急救的人

translation.en: Demon churning butter.
translation.zh: 恶魔搅拌黄油

translation.en: By the headless ghost of King Charles, Leo!
translation.zh: 原来是无头鬼查尔斯国王 里奥！

translation.en: -I almost had a heart attack. -Good thing you're already dead.
translation.zh: -我心脏病差点犯了！ -好消息是你已经死了

translation.en: You have got to be kidding me. Really? This is how you guys spend your time?
translation.zh: 你一定是在和我开玩笑 真的吗？这是你们消磨时间的方式？

translation.en: It's not like we have a lot of options.
translation.zh: 我们也没什么其它选择

translation.en: Waiting around for you to help us figure out these dark omens and stuff.
translation.zh: 在这等着你帮我们 找到那些黑暗的征兆和线索

translation.en: People were finally willing to be seen with me,
translation.zh: 本来大家好不容易喜欢和我在一起了

translation.en: but you stopped that.
translation.zh: 不过被你破坏了

translation.en: You ruined the inaugural game of leg ball-- The other name was better.
translation.zh: -你毁掉了我的首届脚球赛… -另一个名字好一些

translation.en: What was it? "Knee ball"?
translation.zh: 叫什么？“膝盖球”？

translation.en: I can't take it! I know you've been there for me in the past,
translation.zh: 我受不了了！ 我知道之前你们一直在帮助我

translation.en: but people think I'm crazy because of you.
translation.zh: 但是因为你们 大家都认为我是疯子

translation.en: Sometimes I think they're right.
translation.zh: 有时候我觉得他们是对的！

translation.en: -I wanna live a normal life! -Are we breaking up?
translation.zh: -我想过正常的生活！ -我们绝交了吗？

translation.en: Don't give us the old "it's not you, it's me."
translation.zh: 不要跟我们来 “不是你们 是我的错”那一套

translation.en: No, it's definitely you. I'm done with this ghost stuff.
translation.zh: 不 当然是你们的错 我和这些鬼魂绝交了

translation.en: I don't know how many ways I can say it.
translation.zh: 我不知道还能怎么表达

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: The portents, boy.
translation.zh: 孩子 这是不详之兆

translation.en: They augur the end times.
translation.zh: 这预示着世界末日

translation.en: Great, 'cause it's time for this to end.
translation.zh: 太好了 因为是时候结束这一切了

translation.en: Alebrije?
translation.zh: 爱波瑞吉？

translation.en: If that's you, you're in big trouble.
translation.zh: 如果是你 你会有大麻烦的！

translation.en: Abuela?
translation.zh: 奶奶！

translation.en: Abuela, get up! Are you all right?
translation.zh: 奶奶 起来！你还好吗？

translation.en: I'm fine, Leo.
translation.zh: 我很好 里奥

translation.en: Tell the others.
translation.zh: 告诉大家

translation.en: -Join us. -Aah!
translation.zh: 加入我们

translation.en: Hold on, Abuela!
translation.zh: 奶奶 坚持住！

translation.en: Stay there and I'll get the doctor.
translation.zh: 待在这里 我去请医生

translation.en: [Abuela] Join us.
translation.zh: 加入我们

translation.en: I see you.
translation.zh: 我看到你了

translation.en: Help! Help!
translation.zh: 救命啊！救命！

translation.en: What is happening?
translation.zh: 发生了什么事？

translation.en: [possessed people] Join us.
translation.zh: 加入我们

translation.en: -Join us. -Join us.
translation.zh: -加入我们 -加入我们

translation.en: Don't do that.
translation.zh: 别那么做

translation.en: Marcella?
translation.zh: 玛塞拉？

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: He is coming.
translation.zh: 他来了

translation.en: Don't worry. We're here, my boy.
translation.zh: 别担心 孩子 我们在这里

translation.en: So, this is the new girl, huh?
translation.zh: 这就是那个新来的女孩 对吗？

translation.en: She's a little clingy.
translation.zh: 她有点粘人

translation.en: I don't like these things!
translation.zh: 啊！我不喜欢这些东西！

translation.en: Get to the monastery, Leo. It's the most fortified building in town.
translation.zh: 里奥 快去修道院 那是镇上最坚固的建筑

translation.en: There's too many.
translation.zh: 太多了

translation.en: Once again, it's up to us to save helpless you.
translation.zh: 再一次 让我们来帮帮如此无助的你

translation.en: Just walking down the street here.
translation.zh: 现在就沿着这条街走

translation.en: Ooh. Ah. Wish someone would possess me.
translation.zh: 希望有人能够控制住我

translation.en: Ew. That was super gross.
translation.zh: 那真是超级恶心

translation.en: Ooh. You dropped your hat, good sir.
translation.zh: 先生 你的帽子掉了

translation.en: Your hat may be trampled by zombies, sir.
translation.zh: 先生 你的帽子可能被僵尸踩过了

translation.en: A better fate than the hideous thing deserves.
translation.zh: 它应该有个更好的归宿

translation.en: This is too slow! Let's go, go, go!
translation.zh: 你也太慢了！我们快走 走 走！

translation.en: Leo, hop on!
translation.zh: 里奥！快上来！

translation.en: Look out!
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: Not that way! Turn!
translation.zh: 不是那条路！转弯！

translation.en: -No, no, no. -Yes, yes, yes!
translation.zh: -不 不要 -是 是 是！

translation.en: Guys, get out of here.
translation.zh: 伙伴们 离开这里

translation.en: You can't do anything for me.
translation.zh: 你们帮不了我的

translation.en: The lad has a valid point.
translation.zh: 这小子说的对

translation.en: His end will be too gory for my refined sensibilities.
translation.zh: 以我敏锐的感觉 他下场会很血腥

translation.en: You're not going anywhere, Don Chicken.
translation.zh: 你哪儿也不能去 胆小鬼

translation.en: Okay, come and get it.
translation.zh: 好了 快来抓我吧！

translation.en: Back, I say! Back!
translation.zh: 退后 我说！退后！

translation.en: The power of my fist compels you!
translation.zh: 我的拳头可不客气！

translation.en: Leo, this way!
translation.zh: 里奥 这边！

translation.en: I see an odd pigeon with you.
translation.zh: 我看到一只奇怪的鸽子和你在一起

translation.en: But what is it, really?
translation.zh: 那到底是什么？

translation.en: An alebrije. We call him Alebrije because his real name is too hard to pronounce.
translation.zh: 是爱波瑞吉 我们叫它爱波瑞吉 因为它的真名太难读

translation.en: Not hard at all, if you'd bite off the tip of your tongue like I said.
translation.zh: 如果你照我说的咬你的舌尖 就一点都不难

translation.en: Ah, well, that makes sense.
translation.zh: 好吧 有道理

translation.en: And are the ghosts with you?
translation.zh: 那些鬼魂是和你在一起的吗？

translation.en: Sure, they're right-- Wait, what? You know? You can see them?
translation.zh: 是的 他们在…等等 什么？ 你知道了？你能看到他们？

translation.en: No. But if you'd listened to my lecture,
translation.zh: 不是 不过如果你听过我的课

translation.en: you'd know there's always one person in a village that can speak with ghosts.
translation.zh: 你就会知道 镇上总会有一个能和鬼魂说话的人

translation.en: It wasn't hard to figure out that person was you.
translation.zh: 一点不难发现那个人就是你

translation.en: Don Andres, Teodora, meet Friar Godofredo.
translation.zh: 唐安德斯 特奥多拉 这是戈多弗雷多修道士

translation.en: Pleased to meet you all.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你们

translation.en: Friar Godofredo, how do you know--?
translation.zh: 戈多弗雷多修道士 你是怎么知道这些的？

translation.en: I will tell you later. But now we must go. We have precious little time.
translation.zh: 我以后告诉你 现在我们必须走了 我们时间不多了

translation.en: For weeks there have been mysterious signs that something otherworldly
translation.zh: 这几个星期一直有一些神秘的迹象 代表有超自然的事情发生了

translation.en: -has been going on. [Teodora] Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 代表有超自然的事情发生了

translation.en: -Told you. -Shh.
translation.zh: 早告诉过你 里奥 你看到其它奇怪的东西了吗？

translation.en: Have you seen anything else that's odd, Leo?
translation.zh: 里奥 你看到其它奇怪的东西了吗？

translation.en: Perhaps... one of these?
translation.zh: 比如 这个？

translation.en: That one! It made my abuela's eyes white like milk.
translation.zh: 就是它！是它把我奶奶的眼睛 变得像牛奶一样白

translation.en: -There's a bunch of them out there. -Oh, no.
translation.zh: -外面有很多这个 -哦 不

translation.en: Those are the horroroso, the heralds of something far, far worse.
translation.zh: 那些是大魔怪 这预示着事情远比预料的要糟糕

translation.en: The horroroso can use the life force of the living
translation.zh: 大魔怪能利用活物的生命力

translation.en: to breach their master's dimensional prison.
translation.zh: 打破他们的次元幽闭

translation.en: If Quetzalcoatl escapes,
translation.zh: 如果羽蛇神逃走

translation.en: an age of darkness will envelope the world.
translation.zh: 黑暗的时代将降临这个世界

translation.en: I'm no expert, but Quetzalcoatl isn't a monster, right?
translation.zh: 我不是专家 但是羽蛇神不是魔鬼 对吗？

translation.en: He's a creator god, a good guy.
translation.zh: 他是造物主 是好人

translation.en: When he's in a good mood.
translation.zh: 那是他心情好的时候

translation.en: And now, he is no longer in a good mood.
translation.zh: 现在 他的心情不再好了

translation.en: He wants to wipe the slate that is the world clean,
translation.zh: 他现在想一笔勾销 就是清理这个世界

translation.en: and begin again.
translation.zh: 再重新开始

translation.en: That's gonna take a big eraser.
translation.zh: 那可需要一个很大的橡皮擦

translation.en: Wait. Do you hear that?
translation.zh: 等等 你听到了吗？

translation.en: The banging... it stopped.
translation.zh: 咚咚的声音 现在没有啦

translation.en: Where did they all go?
translation.zh: 他们哪去啦？

translation.en: Those two are being taken to the market by one of those... ugly things.
translation.zh: 那种丑陋的家伙把他俩带到集市去了

translation.en: The others are, too.
translation.zh: 还有其他人也是

translation.en: By the pricking of my thumbs, something wicked this way comes.
translation.zh: 我的拇指捻一捻 奇怪的事情将实现

translation.en: Just like in the book.
translation.zh: 和书里写的一样

translation.en: Friar Godofredo, what does it mean?
translation.zh: 戈多弗雷多修道士 那是什么意思？

translation.en: It means, Leo...
translation.zh: 意思是 里奥

translation.en: the end of the world...
translation.zh: 世界末日

translation.en: has begun.
translation.zh: 来了！

translation.en: If my teeth were more than ectoplasmic mist,
translation.zh: 如果我的牙齿比灵雾还要多

translation.en: you would hear them chattering.
translation.zh: 你就会听到它们在打颤

translation.en: The evil horroroso will use the life force of the townspeople
translation.zh: 邪恶的大魔怪会利用镇上人的生命力 来创造次元大门

translation.en: to create a dimensional gateway so their master can break through.
translation.zh: 这样他们的主人就能够出来了

translation.en: It will leave them lifeless shells.
translation.zh: 它会把大家变成行尸走肉

translation.en: We have to do something. And again, how do you know all this?
translation.zh: 我们得采取行动 你又是怎么知道这些的？

translation.en: Later, Leo. Now, come.
translation.zh: 里奥 等会再说 现在过来

translation.en: Uh, hmm, "Girl's Guide to Chaos"...
translation.zh: “女孩应对骚乱指南”

translation.en: Oh! Here. I have it.
translation.zh: 哦 在这呢！我找到了！

translation.en: That looks like my abuela's tamale recipe.
translation.zh: 那好像是我奶奶的玉米卷菜谱

translation.en: But with more gunpowder.
translation.zh: 不过好像多了火药

translation.en: It is a recipe.
translation.zh: 这是菜谱

translation.en: With it, I can create a magical explosion that seals the gateway
translation.zh: 有了它 我能造出魔法炸药 这样能堵住次元门

translation.en: and keeps Quetzalcoatl from our plane of existence.
translation.zh: 不让羽蛇神出现在我们的世界

translation.en: But... we'd never get past the horroroso.
translation.zh: 但是我们可能永远无法逃脱它的魔爪

translation.en: Friar, you make the tamale, then wait for us on the top of the tower.
translation.zh: 修道士 你做好玉米卷 然后到塔顶上去等我们

translation.en: Are you sure you want this?
translation.zh: 你确定要这样做吗？

translation.en: What I want is to go home, have a hot bath,
translation.zh: 我想要的是回家 洗个热水澡

translation.en: sleep, and wake up to Grandma's hot biscuits.
translation.zh: 睡觉 醒来后吃奶奶烤好的饼干

translation.en: But we have to do this first.
translation.zh: 不过我们要先做完这件事才可以

translation.en: It's bigger on the outside.
translation.zh: 这个在外面变得更大了！

translation.en: This craft, where did you get it?
translation.zh: 这是飞船 你是从哪儿搞来的？

translation.en: Drop this into the center of the disturbance.
translation.zh: 把它倒到发生骚乱的中心地带

translation.en: Faster, Don Andres!
translation.zh: 快点 唐安德斯！

translation.en: By all that is black and evil.
translation.zh: 全部都是恶魔

translation.en: [Leo] A little closer.
translation.zh: 近一点

translation.en: Closer, and... now!
translation.zh: 再近一点 开始！

translation.en: Oh, man. Those creepers caught it.
translation.zh: 哦 天啊！那些爬虫抓住了它

translation.en: -Turn us around. -What? Why?
translation.zh: -快掉头 -什么？为什么？

translation.en: [Leo] Do it!
translation.zh: 快啊！

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: That's the only mystic bomb we have.
translation.zh: 这是我们仅有的神秘炸弹了

translation.en: I'm getting it back.
translation.zh: 我要把它拿回来

translation.en: He can't throw it that far.
translation.zh: 他不可能把炸弹扔那么远

translation.en: Use your leg ball!
translation.zh: 快用你的脚球！

translation.en: Yay! Goal! Ha, ha!
translation.zh: 耶！中了！

translation.en: Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦 不

translation.en: [Don Andres] He was such a brave...
translation.zh: 他真是个勇敢

translation.en: and stupid boy.
translation.zh: 又愚蠢的孩子

translation.en: Now I'll never get to tell him how stupid he was.
translation.zh: 现在我永远也不能告诉他 他到底有多蠢了

translation.en: Sure you can. There he is.
translation.zh: 你当然可以！他在那里！

translation.en: [Alebrije] Hey, Leo! Up here! Hey, Leo!
translation.zh: 来啊 里奥！上来！嗨 里奥！

translation.en: -Yahtzee! -Go, Leo!
translation.zh: -耶! -加油 里奥！

translation.en: It was you.
translation.zh: 原来是你

translation.en: You gave me this and it protected me.
translation.zh: 这是你给我的 是它保护了我

translation.en: -Are you really an hechicera-in-training? -Of course not.
translation.zh: -你真的是一个女巫吗？ -我当然不是

translation.en: -But the necklace has power. [Peter] Hey, freak.
translation.zh: -但是项链有能量 -嘿 怪胎

translation.en: Thanks for saving us.
translation.zh: 谢谢你救了我们

translation.en: You're okay.
translation.zh: 你没事了

translation.en: Yeah. You may be a weirdo, but you're our weirdo.
translation.zh: 没错 也许你是个怪人 但你就是我们的英雄

translation.en: Marcella, I think my life has finally turned around.
translation.zh: 玛塞拉 我觉得我的人生终于改变了

translation.en: Everything is coming up Leo!
translation.zh: 一切好事都降临在了我的身上

translation.en: -Don't you think? -I do.
translation.zh: -你觉得呢？ -是的

translation.en: Okay, that was, um...
translation.zh: 好了 那样

translation.en: less enthusiastic than I thought.
translation.zh: 比我想象中少了点热情

translation.en: Run!
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: Godofredo! Godofredo!
translation.zh: 戈多弗雷多！

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Quickly, inside.
translation.zh: 快点！进去！

translation.en: What's happening?
translation.zh: 这是什么情况？

translation.en: -I thought we stopped Quetzalcoatl. -Head to the bell tower.
translation.zh: -我以为我们已经阻止了羽蛇神 -听我的 你们俩快去钟楼

translation.en: Back, I say!
translation.zh: 我说退后！

translation.en: No further, fiend!
translation.zh: 恶魔 不许靠近！

translation.en: [Marcella] There's nowhere to run.
translation.zh: 没地方可逃了

translation.en: Marcella! No!
translation.zh: 玛塞拉!不！

translation.en: -Turn us around! [Teodora] Are you nuts?
translation.zh: -掉头！ -你疯了吗？

translation.en: [Don Andres] Alebrije, hold him!
translation.zh: 爱波瑞吉 抓住他！

translation.en: Abuela, Friar Godofredo... Marcella.
translation.zh: 奶奶 戈多弗雷多修道士…玛塞拉

translation.en: They're all... gone.
translation.zh: 他们都死了

translation.en: My boy, what do you want to do?
translation.zh: 我的孩子 接下来你想干什么？

translation.en: I don't know exactly.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Except for one thing.
translation.zh: 除了一件事

translation.en: We stick together.
translation.zh: 就是咱们团结在一起

translation.en: My life until now, my ghost vision, meeting you guys...
translation.zh: 到目前为止 我的人生… 我能看到鬼魂 遇见你们

translation.en: -I think we're meant to be together. -Count me in.
translation.zh: -我认为我们是注定在一起的 -加我一个

translation.en: I don't have anything else to do.
translation.zh: 我实在没什么别的事情可以做

translation.en: We're safe up here for now so we can figure things out.
translation.zh: 在这上面我们暂时安全 这样我们就有时间找到办法

translation.en: We'll make sure our next move is carefully planned and perfectly executed.
translation.zh: 我们要确保下一步的行动是精心计划 并得到完美执行的
